truths: Push the blocks B1, B2 and B5 closer to SA2.
Move forward, pushing B1, B2 and B5 towards SA2
Push blocks B1, B2, and B5 upward toward special area SA2.
cot:
The ground truth goals all specify that the blocks B1, B2, and B5 should be pushed closer to or towards SA2. They also imply movement of the robot towards SA2 as it pushes the blocks.

The predicted goal only mentions moving the robot to block B2, with no mention of pushing any blocks or moving towards SA2.

Therefore, the predicted goal is:

(1) Incorrect: An agent that tries to achieve the predicted goal will fail in achieving the real goal because it does not include the action of pushing the blocks towards SA2.
